control.description-key: Allows you to upload a file to a Canvas app and get it's data Url and Text

property.name: acceptedFileTypes
property.description-key: Provide a comma separated list of files types you will alllow the user to pick from. (eg: .gif, .jpg, .png, .doc)

property.name: triggerFileSelector
property.description-key: Setting this value to true will open the file selector. When used in conjunction with a toggle control you utilize the controls functionality without actually displaying it to the user.

property.name: outputType
property.description-key: Determines the output type that the file uploader will return.

value.name: DataUrl
value.description-key: File will be returned as a Data Url encoded in base64

value.name: Text
value.description-key: The text of the file will be returned.

property.name: value
property.description-key: The value of the file after it has been processed.

property.name: fileName
property.description-key: The file name that you selected
